Kwararafa University Post UTME Form: Kwararafa University, Wukari (KUW) Post UTME Form for 2024/2025 Academic Session.

This page reveals all about the Kwararafa University, Wukari (KUW) Post UTME Form.

You will know if the KUW Post UTME form is out, how much the form is, when the form will be released, candidates eligible to buy the form, available courses offered by the institution, and how to apply for the form.

Some Fun Facts About Kwararafa University

Overview of Kwararafa University:

Kwararafa University is the first community promoted University in Nigeria, situated in Wukari, Taraba State.

It was licensed by the National Universities Commission in 2005 and officially changed its name from Wukari Jubilee to Kwararafa in February 2012.

The university enjoys a rich historical background, located in an ancient city that was once the headquarters of the Kwararafa Confederacy.

Mission of Kwararafa University:

Kwararafa University aims to provide a distinguished public education, emphasizing learning in business, education, and sciences.

It focuses on developing both skills and competencies essential for success and leadership in the emerging creative economy.

The university is committed to generating practical and theoretical knowledge for local and global communities.

Vision of Kwararafa University:

Kwararafa University aspires to be the leading intellectual and creative center for effective engagement in a world that demands better-designed solutions to meet social needs.

Its vision aligns with shifts in the global economy, society, and environment, emphasizing creativity, innovation, social engagement, and commitment to student success and public service.

Is the Kwararafa University Post UTME form out?

No, the KUW Post UTME Form for 2024/2025 is not yet out.

As soon as the form comes out, we will update this page.

Always visit this page to find out if the form has been released.

When Will the Kwararafa University Post UTME Form Be Out

The KUW Post UTME Form for 2024/2025 will likely be on sale from May 2024.

As soon as the form is released, we will update it on this page.

Again, Always visit this page to know when the form comes out.

How Much is Kwararafa University Post UTME Form

KUW Post UTME Form is probably around N7,000.

Candidates Eligible to Buy Kwararafa University Post UTME Screening Form

Admissions through the UTME:

Candidates applying for admission to 100 level must have five (5) credit passes in relevant subjects at SSCE, GCE, NECO, or equivalent, obtained in not more than two sittings.

They must also achieve the JAMB cut-off mark in the Unified Tertiary Matriculation Examination.

The University mandates credit passes in English Language and Mathematics for all applicants.

Additionally, the University conducts post-JAMB screening to ensure the admission of top-performing students.

Specific departmental requirements must also be met by candidates.

Admission through Direct Entry mode:

Candidates seeking admission to 200 level should possess five (5) credit passes at SSCE, GCE, NECO, or equivalent, including English Language, obtained in not more than two sittings.

Additionally, candidates should have either:

Two advanced level passes in relevant subjects in the General Certificate of Education examination; or

Ordinary National Diploma with credit level or Nigeria Certificate of Education (NCE) with Credit level.

They should also have passes in two IJMB/JUPEB courses out of the three offered.

Cut-Off Mark

KUW‚Äôs Cut-off mark is 140. (Varies with Catchment area)

How to Apply for Kwararafa University Post UTME

Application Procedure at Kwararafa University:

Interested candidates are invited to apply online through the University‚Äôs official website.

The application process involves completing an application form and submitting a non-refundable fee of N7,000.

Applications will be considered only upon receipt of the application fee.

For More Information:

Prospective students can visit the official Kwararafa University website at http://www.kuw.edu.ng for additional details.

Any inquiries regarding the application process, requirements, deadlines, or available courses can be addressed on the university‚Äôs website.

Conclusion:

KUW provides diverse compelling programs across various fields, showcasing its dedication to academic excellence and societal advancement. Prospective candidates are urged to apply, following the detailed requirements and application procedures outlined above.

This is a precious opportunity to make your dreams come true and we are prepared to support your aspirations and help you succeed.

We wish you the best as you seek admission to this prestigious institution. May you find great achievement on your path ahead at Kwararafa University, Wukari
